title: Aatrox New Re-Reworked Ult!

embed.description: Post with 1 views. Shared by Darkruger. Aatrox Re-reworked ult!

body:
Hey

I am THYE Aatrox main, lvl 7 with over 700,000 point on this champ. I have a great idea which I believe everybody will agree. When Aatrox ults, how about we not increase his size and just give him a movement speed and att boost, then make it where you can caste it a second time (animation: Aatrox swings his sword sending a big badasz SLASH out!)

OMG...Now that's some riot creativity for your asz!

replies.body:
Why so much effort for a shitpost

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Hey

I think I put just as much effort if not more in this post then Riot did in Aatrox rework. Shit reworks = shitposts. Get the banana out your asz bud

> [{quoted}](name=Dark Ruger,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=A8YFLtEF,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-06-22T21:46:48.886+0000)
>
> asz

I'm not sure how I feel about this.
